channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former Biden official 'pleased' Trump admin tackling antisemitism

item.title: DC Courts Are Such A Mess Because Leftist Judges, Not POTUS, Pick Their Colleagues
item.description: Fixing the broken D.C. judicial appointment process is straightforward: Replace it with the process that already exists for nominating, confirming, an...

item.title: South Carolina’s Play To Nullify Tariffs In 1832 Failed Spectacularly. Newsom’s Will Too
item.description: Gavin Newsom is dusting off John C. Calhoun’s playbook from 1832, arguing his state can nullify federal law.

item.title: Marines Don’t Betray Allies and Reward Foes
item.description: The Ukrainian people are fighting for the same values for which Marines and American men and women throughout our history have fought and died.

item.title: Don’t Force Sex and Gender Ideology on Little Kids
item.description: The Supreme Court should recognize that parents have a right to shield their young kids from sex and gender indoctrination in public school.

item.title: Forcing a Meta Breakup Would Be Bad News for Consumers
item.description: As the Meta case continues, the focus must be on consumers, not companies or competitors.

item.title: Cory Bowman, J.D. Vance's half brother, runs for Cincinnati mayor
item.description: Cory Bowman was feeling inspired in January as he headed home after watching his half brother, J.D. Vance, be inaugurated as vice president.

item.title: IRS turmoil: Leadership churn, worker exodus and threats to groups' tax-exempt status roil agency
item.description: The height of tax season was the height of turmoil at the IRS. The agency shuffled through three acting directors over the course of a week.

item.title: Wall Street rallies on Trump's softer approach to Powell, China
item.description: Wall Street is poised to rally Wednesday after President Trump softened his rhetoric on Fed Chair Jerome Powell and China.

item.title: Don’t Cry for Catherine Deneuve
item.description: The President’s Wife shows how to defend a first lady.

item.title: Gingrich says Trump note shows he wants to avoid raising taxes
item.description: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich said President Trump told him he has no plans to raise taxes on anyone.

item.title: 15 Gifts To Celebrate Your Favorite Graduates That Aren’t Cash
item.description: If you know someone graduating high school or college and you'd like to gift something personal, try one of these thoughful options.

item.title: Trump’s Next Target In Dismantling The Censorship Complex Is CISA
item.description: The legislative branch must codify the administration’s policies to ensure a speech policing apparatus does return under a future president.

item.title: Another Problem with Medicaid: It’s Pushing Women Toward Abortion
item.description: Directing federal dollars to prenatal care could result in a better long-term financial picture if it helps Americans more readily welcome children.

item.title: Leader of Colombia says Trump admin revoked his US visa
item.description: The president of Colombia, Gustavo Petro, claimed in a cabinet meeting on Monday that the Trump administration revoked his travel visa.
